channel.title: [PI Source] Quake UK
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i620.photobucket.com/albums/tt281/crossconnectpictures/Other/quakeuk.jpg[/img][/center]
[left][b][u]Vacancies[/u][/b][/left] All vacancies below require the person's time to be approx +0 GMT. NO MASSIVE EXPERIENCE - BASICALLY A LEARNING SERVER WHICH IN THE END WILL BE HOSTED WHEN WE ARE EXPERIENCED ENOUGH - PRIVATE MESSAGE ME
- Co-Owner (Must have a little coding experience (being able to fix bugs involving npc/home shops etc if they come up), Age 18+, Active + Mature, have good experience in RSPS managing.)
- Developer (Must have good coding experience, needs to be able to fix items that do not work properly, to add to the combat system to get it closer to perfect, work on the summoning system already in place + make it work a little better and to finish off to be able to make the skills closer to perfect)
- Head Admin (In charge of promoting appropriate players to moderators, to be close nit with the servers community (finding more about people etc, being very sociable.) To forward appropriate suggestions and bugs to the server owners and developers.
[b][u]About[/u][/b] [i]317[/i] To begin with before any server/sponsor spots are bought the first task is to create a completely independent server source. I have got plenty of ideas and simple things which will be added (kept secret for now between the server team)
The server will have all items obtainable some how without donating - but there will be certain things that will be added that will give a donatr an advantage in game.
Items will be related within skills. For example you can create Overload(4) in herblore and catch raw rocktail in fishing.
Original Source - [u]TorvaPkz[/u]

item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:13, topic:401163”][quote author=X Entinity X link=topic=498224.msg3644647#msg3644647 date=1309287674]

Your requirements are quite dumb mate, the co-owner being 18+? That’s stupid as Hell, there are a fair amount of 14-15+ year old people who are as mature as 18-20 year old people.

Good luck with the development nevertheless.

I’m 14 :).
[/quote]^He’s smarter than I am, and I am 22.[/quote]

U r stupid tho.
